metadata.title: CVE-2015-5271 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The TripleO Heat templates (tripleo-heat-templates) do not properly orderthe Identity Service (keystone) before the OpenStack Object Storage (Swift)staticweb middleware in the swiftproxy pipeline when the staticwebmiddleware is enabled, which might allow remote attackers to obtainsensitive information from private containers via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5271` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-tripleo-heat-templates - 5.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tripleo-heat-templates package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.0-1').
